name: QCCompositionLayer
desc: A layer that loads, plays, and controls Quartz Composer compositions in a Core Animation layer hierarchy.

items.name: init!(file: String!)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a composition layer using the Quartz Composer composition in the specified file.

items.name: init!(composition: QCComposition!)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a composition layer using the provided Quartz Composer composition.

items.name: func composition() -> QCComposition!
items.desc: Returns the composition associated with the layer.
